JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We're Hiring: Restaurant Administrator & Manager

Are you ready to make a significant impact in the restaurant industry? We’re looking for a talented and motivated Restaurant Administrator and Manager to join our team! If you’re organized, passionate about food and hospitality, and ready to lead, we want to hear from you.

Roles Available:

· Restaurant Administrator & Manager

Restaurant Administrator & Manager Responsibilities:

· Handle day-to-day administrative tasks, including scheduling, payroll, and inventory tracking

· Ensure proper documentation and record-keeping for compliance and operational efficiency

· Assist with employee onboarding and HR processes

· Manage customer reservations, inquiries, and special requests

· Maintain a smooth flow of communication between front-of-house and back-of-house teams

· Oversee office supplies, staff uniforms, and other restaurant-related needs

· Supervise and direct daily restaurant operations, ensuring excellent guest experiences

· Lead, train, and motivate a dedicated team of front-line staff

· Handle guest concerns and ensure customer satisfaction

· Manage financials, including budgeting, cost control, and reporting

· Maintain health, safety, and cleanliness standards throughout the restaurant

· Coordinate staff schedules and shift management

· Develop and implement strategies for improving service, sales, and overall performance

What We’re Looking For:

· For Administrator: Strong administrative, organizational, and time-management skills; experience with office software and payroll systems; attention to detail.

· For Manager: Proven leadership experience in a fast-paced restaurant setting; ability to think quickly on your feet and make decisions under pressure; exceptional customer service and communication skills.

· A passion for food, people, and hospitality

· A team player with a positive attitude and strong work ethic

What We Offer:

· Competitive salary and benefits package

· Career growth opportunities in a dynamic work environment

· A fun, friendly, and supportive team atmosphere

· Flexible scheduling to support work-life balance

If you're ready to step up and lead in a thriving restaurant environment, apply now to become a key player in our team!

 

Apply today at info@indis.dk or visit our website for more information.
